snippet: One armed man blew himself up, state news outlets reported, in a type of clash that remains rare in the capital even after over four years of war.
abstract: Al Qaeda affiliate Nusra Front in Syria claims responsibility for unusually severe attack on military supplies and logistics headquarters in heart of Damascus.

byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad and Maher Samaan contributed reporting from Beirut, and an employee of The New York Times from Damascus, Syria.

lead_paragraph: One armed man blew himself up, state news outlets reported, in a type of clash that remains rare in the capital even after over four years of war.

headline.main: Syrian Forces Kill Attackers in Damascus
